title: Track In-Transit Shipment for Customer
description: A customer service agent receives a call asking for the status of an in-transit shipment. The agent must locate the shipment and provide an ETA.

tasks.description: Use the customer's order number to find the associated shipment and its tracking number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly retrieves the shipment details and tracking ID.

tasks.description: Query the carrier's tracking system using the tracking number to get the latest status and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the latest tracking event (e.g., 'Out for Delivery') and the carrier's ETA.

tasks.description: Communicate the current status and estimated delivery time to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly and accurately provides the tracking information to the customer.
